message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,200,000. This is a great deal, considering the product is worth $1,000,000 to you. I'm confident you'll be happy with the price.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but I'm looking to spend closer to $1,000,000. Would you be willing to come down to $1,050,000? This is a fair price that would give us both a good deal.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your desire to get the product at a lower price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1,050,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1,175,000. This is a fair compromise that still allows me to earn a good profit. I'm confident you'll find this offer reasonable.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $1,175,000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable spending. Would you consider $1,100,000? This is a fair price that allows us both to walk away satisfied.

Bob, I understand your desire to get the product at a lower price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1,100,000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $1,125,000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the product's value to you. I'm not willing to go any lower.
